tags.description: An Issuer Profile describes a person that awards Open Badges

tags.name: Badges_BadgeType
tags.description: A BadgeType is a type of badge that an Issuer may award over and over (creating many Assertions of that BadgeType, each for a different recipient)

tags.name: Badges_Assertions
tags.description: An Assertion is an instance of a BadgeType  that is awarded to one recipient.

post.summary: Post data about the task status

put.summary: Update the values by norm ID

get.summary: searches for all incentive infos of a community of users

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: the app that the user pagination

get.description: searches for a user of a specific application and returns incentive information of that user.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: the app that the user pagination

requestBody.description: The request body for disabling the incentive server

parameters.description: The user id that issue complaint

requestBody.description: The request body for enabling the incentive server

put.summary: Update an existing BadgeType.  Previously issued BadgeInstances will NOT be updated

post.summary: Issue an Assertion to a single recipient

get.summary: Get a list of Assertions for a single BadgeType

parameters.description: A recipient identifier to filter by
parameters.name: recipient

attribute.description: The name of the attribute whose value the norm should be compared to

comparison.description: The norm value for the comparison

nagation.description: Specified if a negation operator should be applied

reason.description: The reason for disabling the incentive server
The reason for enabling the incentive server

incentive.description: The content of the regard incentive

openBadgeId.description: URL of the OpenBadge compliant json

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the Assertion was created

badgeclassOpenBadgeId.description: URL of the BadgeType to award

image.description: URL to the baked assertion image

identity.description: Either the hash of the identity or the plaintext value

type.description: Type of identifier used to identify recipient

hashed.description: Whether or not the identity value is hashed.

recipient.description: Recipient that was issued the Assertion

issuedOn.description: Timestamp when the Assertion was issued

evidence.description: List of evidence associated with the achievement

revoked.description: True if this Assertion has been revoked

revocationReason.description: Short description of why the Assertion was revoked

badgeclassName.description: Name of BadgeType to create assertion against, case insensitive

url.description: URL of a webpage presenting evidence of the achievement

narrative.description: Markdown narrative that describes the achievement

openBadgeId.description: URL of the OpenBadge compliant json

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the BadgeType was created

issuer.description: entityId of the Issuer who owns the BadgeType

image.description: Base64 encoded string of an image that represents the BadgeType.

criteriaUrl.description: External URL that describes in a human-readable format the criteria for the BadgeType

criteriaNarrative.description: Markdown formatted description of the criteria.note, criteriaNarrative or criteriaUrl is required.

alignments.description: List of objects describing objectives or educational standards

tags.description: List of tags that describe the BadgeType,one or more strings.

expires.description: Expiration period for Assertions awarded from this BadgeType

alignments.description: List of objects describing objectives or educational standards

tags.description: List of tags that describe the BadgeType,one or more strings.

expires.description: Expiration period for Assertions awarded from this BadgeType

email.description: Email address associated with a BadgeUser

verified.description: True if the email address has been verified

primary.description: True for a single email address to receive email notifications

token.description: Access token to use in the Authorization header

share_url.description: A public URL for sharing the Collection

published.description: True if the Collection has a public share URL

assertions.description: List of Assertions in the collection

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the Collection was created

image.description: Base64 encoded string of an image that represents the Issuer
